name: Starlight
description: Restores 15 MP.

name: Herb
description: Restores 30 HP (or something with a really long description).

name: Pooh
description: Pooh!

name: Thermal_Activator
description: Revives Crystal...somehow.

name: Bronze_Key
description: Key to the love shack. | Awww yeah.

name: Pearl_of_Truth
description: Shows the truth to all. Also opens castle gate and makes Julienne fries!

name: West_Tower_Key
description: Key to West Tower.

name: East_Tower_Key
description: Key to East Tower.

name: Spire_Key
description: Key to Central Spire.

name: Bacon
description: There's only one thing that smells like bacon, and it's this. | Restores 90 HP.

name: Miracle_Brew
description: Revives a defeated ally with a few HP.

name: Sacred_Carrot
description: Item of Absolute Power!

name: Atlas_Scroll
description: Shows position on map.

name: Golden_Switch
description: Award for completing the Switch Puzzle in the minimum moves.

name: Something_Cool
description: This is something cool!

name: Long_Piece
description: An unusual object Lance claims opens the way to the Sand Cave.

name: Wooden_Sword
description: It's dangerous to go alone! Take this. | ATK+15

name: Iron_Sword
description: Better than the wooden sword, because it's made of metal. | ATK+22

name: White_Sword
description: Is your sword white enough? Try Crest WhiteStrips today! | ATK+32

name: Paired_Swords
description: This is like a normal sword except there are two. So it's better! | ATK+24, STK+1

name: Flaming_Sword
description: As seen in the Bible! | Fire, ATK +45

name: Dark_Sword
description: A cursed weapon that brings death to foes. | Dark, ATK+52, CTR+5, adds Death

name: Carrot_Blade
description: Surging with power! Sacred blade, smite my enemies! | Holy, ATK+65, adds Grave

name: Saladbolg
description: This legendary weapon cleaves opponents in two as easily as chopping tomatoes. | ATK+40, STR+5, HIT+30, FER+100

name: Hand_Axe
description: When you don't know what to do, just axe! | ATK+26, FER+25

name: Battleaxe
description: This Valentine's Day, say it with axe. | ATK+40, FER+25

name: Spear
description: The quintessential weapon: it's long and the end is pointy. | ATK+30, HIT+10

name: Steel_Lance
description: 10,000 jousters can't be wrong! | ATK+42, HIT+15

name: Thunderstroke
description: A spear as swift and deadly as a bolt of lightning. | Electric, ATK+56, HIT+30, adds Paralysis

name: Gungnir
description: A legendary spear named after an ancient hero. | ATK+62, HIT+15, +Accurate, resist Blind and Weak

name: Staff
description: The thinking man's club. | ATK+10, MAG+4

name: Wand
description: Using a weapon this wimpy is really making a statement. | ATK+6, MAG+9, no CTR, no FER

name: Pastoral_Staff
description: A staff used by shepherds. Blessed by the spirits of a thousand sheep. | Holy, ATK+12, MAG+6

name: Mace
description: Sutble. Stealthy. An instrument of finesse, suitable f- | *THUD*SMASH*

name: Jeweled_Rod
description: See, this is what you get when ricers learn magic. | ATK+15, MAG+8

name: Druid_Staff
description: I guess it's a staff that belonged to a druid? | ATK+23, MAG+10

name: Pharaoh_Sceptre
description: Perfect for the immortal god-king in your life. | Dark, ATK+25, MAG+25, MP+10, adds Depress

name: Croziest
description: A weapon so holy that only a supremely righteous soul can wield it. | Holy, ATK+40, MAG+20, FER+20, HP+15

name: Wonder_Wand
description: This wand pushes your magical ability to its limits. | ATK+10, MAG+15, no CTR, no FER, +Enlighten

name: Support_Staff
description: This staff's powerful defensive magic should ease your crippling insecurities. | ATK+40, MAG+4, MGR+12, END+12

name: Stylin'_Cane
description: The True King of Funk pulled this dope cane from the engine block of a 1974 Ford Mustang II. | ATK+30, HIT+15, MAG+12, CTR+100, adds Charm

name: Diamond_Staff
description: One of the strongest staffs (if not THE strongest staff) known to man. | ATK+35, MAG+25, MGR+20, END+5, resist Silence and Seal

name: Sting_Whip
description: Hurts so good! Wait, no, not 'good'. What's the other one... bad! | ATK+28, HIT+10, FER+10, adds Slow

name: Frostbite
description: One touch of this icy whip will make your blood run cold. | Ice, ATK+36, HIT+15, FER+10, adds Sleep

name: Fairy_Lash
description: A thorned whip used by Oberon's carriage-driver. Except for some reason it was in a chest. | ATK+48, HIT+20, FER+10, adds Charm

name: Wrench
description: Sara's sturdy wrench. It's a bit unwieldy, but it packs a wallop. | ATK+25, HIT-5

name: Lead_Pipe
description: A section of heavy pipe. +2 against Romans. | ATK+30

name: Nightstick
description: This is a stick, but it's much stronger than a normal stick because it has a sideways handle thing. | ATK+45, FER+5

name: Sledgehammer
description: It's not very practical, but there's a certain style that only a sledgehammer has. | ATK+55, FER+25, CTR-5, HIT-8, REA-1, adds Fragile

name: Science!
description: They all laughed at me! Well, who's laughing now!? | ATK+40, STR+15, MAG+8, HIT+8, adds Blind, resist Weak and Fugue

name: Brass_Knuckles
description: For legal reasons, we have to call these a paperweight. | ATK+15, STK+1, CTR+15, FER+20

name: Razor_Claws
description: Razor claws combine the fun of punching with the effectiveness of stabbing! | ATK+26, STK+1, CTR+15, FER+20

name: Giant_Robot_Hands
description: GIANT |   ROBOT |     HANDS!!!! | ATK+30, STK+2, CTR+15, FER+20, adds Confuse

name: Dagger
description: This is a good introductory model for someone who's just getting into stabbing. | ATK+10

name: Poison_Dagger
description: Poison is slow, but you don't have to do anything. | ATK+13, adds Poison

name: Stiletto
description: A long, thin knife. Voted Weapon of the Year in Scoundrel Quarterly. | ATK+18, HIT+5, FER+5

name: Khukri
description: This deadly curved knife has an extra H for added cutting power. | ATK+30,FER+10

name: North_Wind
description: With this icy blade in hand your attacks will be as fast and lethal as a winter storm. | Ice, ATK+15, HIT+10, STK+1

name: Assassin's_Knife
description: <Hahn> Hmm... assassins are cool because they have two asses. | ATK+42, HIT+20, MAG+6, adds Death

name: Sting_Needle
description: This unassuming needle lets you lash out like a swarm of angry wasps. | ATK+10, HIT+10, STK+2, CTR+50, no FER

name: Syringe
description: Be sure to properly dispose of all sharps. | HIT+15, no CTR, no FER, adds impairments

name: Buckler
description: Make sure to read the swashing instructions on the back. | DEF+5, DOD+5

name: Laser_Shield
description: This shield blocks attacks with the power of lasers, somehow. | DEF+7, DOD+7, halve Electric

name: Tower_Shield
description: Only REAL MEN can hoist this five-foot-tall shield. | DEF+10, DOD+10

name: Sunburst_Shield
description: Sun Protection Factor 15 | DEF+15, DOD+10, halve Fire and Holy

name: Spellbook
description: This book explains the principles behind magic, but only Dexter can understand it, and he already knows magic. | MAG+4, MGR+4

name: Grimoire
description: It has a skull on the cover, so you know it has to be good! | MAG+9, MGR+9

name: Main_Gauche
description: Don't use it in your RightHand - that would be gauche. | ATK+5, CTR+5, DOD+5

name: Swordbreaker
description: A classic duelist's weapon. | ATK+10, CTR+10, DOD+10

name: Bracer
description: A bracer. There's only one, so it'll look a little strange, but maybe you can play it off like it's a fashion thing. | DEF+4

name: Silver_Bracer
description: Stronger than a normal bracer, but will tarnish if not polished regularly. | DEF+10

name: Rosary
description: for (int bead=0;bead<59;bead++) { |     meditate_on(mystery[bead]) | } | MGR +3, resist some afflictions)

name: Muscle_Band
description: You could work out, or you could just wear this thing. | ATK+6, resist Weak

name: Wisdom_Band
description: This band is chock full of magic, so if you wear it some is bound to rub off on you. | MAG+6, resist Fugue

name: Tornado_Bracelet
description: Wearing this bracelet lets you strike with the wild fury of a tornado. | STK+1, HIT-7

name: Crystal_Ball
description: It rolls, so be careful not to drop it. | MP+10

name: Wristwatch
description: The wristwatch is why God invented the left arm. Never be late again! | REA+1, resist Slow

name: Garment
description: Hide your nakedness! | DEF+10

name: Cloak
description: Activate cloaking device! | DEF+12, MGR+3

name: Robe
description: Pants interfere with mana flow, so wizards usually wear robes. | DEF+18, MGR+6

name: Vestments
description: Only church members can wear these clothes because otherwise God will get mad. | DEF+15, MGR+10, negate Holy

name: Black_Robe
description: Popular with cultists the world over. | DEF+20, MAG+3, MGR+3, negate Dark but double Holy

name: Long_Coat
description: I guess it's pretty long, but I was expecting more. | DEF+26, MGR+9

name: Silk_Clothes
description: Because sometimes you just want to look good. | DEF+12, MGR+6, DOD+25, resist Tangle

name: Jogging_Suit
description: Helps you run fast, but looks kind of dumb. | DEF+20, REA+1

name: Ninja_Suit
description: You will never be a ninja, but if you wear this, at least you can pretend. | DEF+30, DOD+20, CTR+10, +Evade

name: Innocence_Frock
description: This sky-blue frock can only be worn by those pure of heart, and also Crystal. | DEF+35, MGR+15, HP+15, resist Grave & Death, absorb Holy but double Dark

name: Flame_Robe
description: A bright red robe that absorbs fire but is weak to ice and electricity. | DEF+38, MGR+12, absorb Fire but double Ice and Electric

name: Frost_Robe
description: A bright blue robe that absorbs ice but is weak to fire and electricity. | DEF+38, MGR+12, absorb Ice but double Fire and Electric

name: Spark_Robe
description: A bright yellow robe that absorbs electricity but is weak to fire and ice. | DEF+38, MGR+12, absorb Electric but double Fire and Ice

name: Dream_Mantle
description: A flowing mantle as mysterious as a dream. | DEF+46, MGR+15, MP+10

name: Leather_Vest
description: Normally people would look at you funny if you wore this, but you have a sword too, so they'll probably leave you alone. | DEF+15

name: Chain_Mail
description: Chain mail extends the concept of a chain into two dimensions. | DEF+22

name: Iron_Suit
description: You could maybe put some fridge magnets on this, personalize it a bit. | DEF+30, DOD-10, resist Fragile

name: Titanium_Suit
description: Wait, they have titanium? Why don't they use it everywhere? | DEF+42, DOD-10, resist Fragile

name: Dwarven_Mail
description: It's a bit small, but discomfort builds character. | DEF+35, negate Fire but double Ice

name: Plate_Mail
description: Some assembly required. | DEF+45, DOD-5

name: Steel_Frame
description: 'Robot chic' is this year's hot new look. | DEF+48, MGR+4, END+4, absorb Electric

name: Rock_Mail
description: Armor made of solid stone. Powerful, but weak against paper. | DEF+55, MGR+5, DOD-15, resist Fragile

name: Dragon_Armor
description: Dragon scales make good armor, but upset vegan types. | DEF+54, halve Fire and Ice

name: Stan's_Armor
description: Ew, it smells kind of funny. | DEF+60, CTR+15, HP+15, absorb Dark but double Holy

name: Atlas_Plate
description: The ultimate in not-dying technology. | DEF+60, STR+6, END+6, MGR+6

name: Heroic_Panoply
description: Only a protagonist can wear this plot-infused armor. | DEF+65, MGR+6, halve Holy and Dark, resist Death and Grave

name: Turtle_Shell
description: Slow and steady wins the race. | DEF+30, END+120, MGR+120, DOD-15, REA-999, +Protect, +Barrier

name: Capacitor_Array
description: Enables Sara's 'Taser' skill. | HIT+3, halve Electric

name: Solar_Lens
description: Enables Sara's 'Sunray' skill. | ATK+5, resist Enervate, Blind and Fugue

name: Turbocharger
description: Enables Sara's 'Turbo' skill. | REA+1, resist Tangle

name: Photoaccumulator
description: Enables Sara's 'Charge' skill. | HP+5, resist stat reducers

name: Neutralizer
description: Enables Sara's 'Neutro' skill. | MGR+3, END+3, DEF+3, resist ElementWeak, Depress, and Fragile

name: Antimagic_Field
description: Enables Sara's 'Negate' skill. | MGR+6, attacks add Silence

name: Headband
description: For when you want something on your head, but a hat is too much. | DOD+3

name: Hood
description: Where the hood at? | DEF+1, MGR+2, MAG+3

name: Silver_Circlet
description: This circlet is incomplete, but well-made. | DEF+3, MGR+5, MAG+7

name: Jaunty_Cap
description: Can you handle the jauntiness? | MAG+2, DOD+3

name: My_Grand_Hat
description: The King of Hats. | DEF+5, MGR+5, DOD+5, resist stat reducers

name: Helmet
description: For people whose job involves getting hit in the head. | DEF+5

name: Gold_Helmet
description: Adventure in style with this snazzy golden helmet! | DEF+10

name: Tiara
description: Oh, thank you, it's such an honor! | DEF+3, MAG+3, MGR+4

name: Blur_Ring
description: Wearing this ring makes you as elusive as Bigfoot. | DOD+20, REA+1, resist Tangle

name: Fury_Ring
description: Wearing this ring allows you to tap the boundless rage of Tatsumi. | STR+3, FER+30, CTR+5

name: Life_Ring
description: Wearing this ring postpones your inevitable demise. | HP+12, resist Death and Grave

description: Remember the Alamo! | STR+6, ATK+6
